overview: Set in New York's Lower East Side during the Gay '90s, this lively low-budget musical follows the exploits of a feisty and talented saloon owner's daughter who loves nothing more than to perform in her father's tavern. Her late-night shenanigans appall her wealthy and socially conscious aunt who launches a secret campaign to shut down the bar and force her niece to reside in her palatial home.
tagline: A Teasin' Squeezin' Story Of The Bowery... To the Tunes of Gus Edwards!
title: Sunbonnet Sue
